ast.name: Easter
ast.comment: Calculate and display the dates of Easter and Orthodox Easter for any year after introduction of the Gregorian Calendar.

body.text: What year are we interested in?
It has to be 1582 or later because it was February 1582 that the Gregorian Calendar was first adopted.
We'll keep looping until a zero value is found as the requested year.

elseBody.text: Calculate the date of Easter for the requested year
Calculate the date of Orthodox Easter for the requested year as well. This will be displayed as a Gregorian date.
Year was set as zero so we're stopping.

body.text: Initialize all our variables for calculating the date of Easter Sunday for the requested year.
Calculate the date of Easter for the requested year.
The algorithm is based on the algorithm of J M Oudin (1940).
Initialize all our variables for calculating the date of Orthodox Easter Sunday for the requested year.
Calculate the date of Orthodox Easter for the requested year. This will be displayed as a Gregorian date.
Determine whether Easter Sunday for the requested year is in the future, the past or is occurring right now.

elseBody.text: Return text indicating the calculated date relative to today.
Return text indicating the calculated date relative to today.
Return text indicating the calculated date relative to today.

body.text: Determine whether Easter Sunday for the requested year is in the future, the past or right now.
Determine whether Orthodox Easter Sunday for the requested year is in the future, the past or right now.
Calculate the number of weeks between Easter and Orthodox Easter.
Display the dates of Easter Sunday and Orthodox Easter Sunday for the requested year.
